prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a small wolf with sharp teeth and bright eyes.
Show me a Pokemon with a sleek body, gray fur, and a mischievous expression.
Imagine a quadruped Pokemon with a blend of gray and red colors, perfect for stealthy attacks.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a cunning hunter in a forest environment.
Design a Pokemon with an agile build and a fierce gaze, ready to pounce on its prey.
Give me a description of a small, dark-colored Pokemon that thrives in urban areas.
Make a Pokemon that has a wolf-like appearance and a playful yet fierce personality.
